# DuckduckR

This is an *R* client for [DuckDuckGo's Instant Answer API](https://duckduckgo.com/api).

## Install

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("dirkschumacher/duckduckr")
```


## Use
```{r, echo = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>",
  fig.path = "README-"
)
```

```{r}
library(duckduckr)
res <- duckduck_answer("ggplot")
```

```{r,eval=FALSE}
res$result$Abstract
```
<blockquote>
`r res$result$Abstract`
</blockquote>
